/* CodeMapper.ListCode */
WITH RECURSIVE R AS ( SELECT CD.CODE_ID, CD.UP_CODE_ID, CD.CODE_VALUE, CD.CODE_NAME, CD.CODE_CONTENT, CD.CODE_ORDER, CAST(CD.CODE_ORDER AS CHAR(200)) AS SORT_ORDER, CD.CODE_DEPTH, CD.USE_YN, CD.USER_ID FROM CO_CODE CD WHERE CD.UP_CODE_ID IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT CD.CODE_ID, CD.UP_CODE_ID, CD.CODE_VALUE, CD.CODE_NAME, CD.CODE_CONTENT, CD.CODE_ORDER, CONCAT(R.SORT_ORDER, '-', LPAD(CD.CODE_ORDER, 5, '0')) AS SORT_ORDER, CD.CODE_DEPTH, CD.USE_YN, CD.USER_ID FROM CO_CODE CD INNER JOIN R ON CD.UP_CODE_ID = R.CODE_ID ) SELECT R.CODE_ID, R.UP_CODE_ID, R.CODE_VALUE, R.CODE_NAME, R.CODE_CONTENT, R.CODE_ORDER, R.CODE_DEPTH, R.USE_YN, R.USER_ID FROM R WHERE R.USER_ID IS NULL ORDER BY CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(R.SORT_ORDER, '-', 1) AS UNSIGNED), CASE WHEN R.SORT_ORDER LIKE '%-%' THEN CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(R.SORT_ORDER, '-', -1) AS UNSIGNED) ELSE 0 END

/* CodeMapper.GetCode */
SELECT CD.CODE_ID, CD.UP_CODE_ID, CD.CODE_VALUE, CD.CODE_NAME, CD.CODE_CONTENT, CD.CODE_ORDER, CD.CODE_DEPTH, CD.USE_YN, CD.USER_ID FROM CO_CODE CD WHERE CD.CODE_ID = @CodeId
